labelExpressionInfo.expression: var dataDiff = DateDiff(Date(Now()), Date($feature["status_timestamp"]), 'minutes'); var hour = Floor(dataDiff/60); var minute = Round(dataDiff - hour*60); return hour + 'h:' + minute + 'm'

labelingInfo.expression: var dataDiff = DateDiff(Date(Now()), Date($feature["status_timestamp"]), 'minutes'); var hour = Floor(dataDiff/60); var minute = Round(dataDiff - hour*60); return hour + 'h:' + minute + 'm'
